title: Thousands flood GotaGoGama demanding Change
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Thousands flooded the streets of Galle Face on Sunday (8) as the Occupy Galle Face protest continued at the famous protest site GotaGoGama for the 31st day, demanding the resignation of the President, Prime Minister, and the Government.

Sri Lankans from various parts of the country joined the protest campaign under various themes, and demand the money stolen from the people be recovered immediately while calling for the law to be enforced against those responsible for looting public funds.
At the same time, the MynaGoGama protest demanding the resignation of the Prime Minister continued for the 14th day.
Sri Lankan Shaman performed a tradition thovil outside Temple Trees, the official residence of Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa on Sunday (8) night.
`This is part of the call for Prime Minister Rajapaksa, and his brother President Gotabaya Rajapaksa to resign with their government with immediate effect.
